name: hugo-theme-bootstrap4-blog
description: A Bootstrap v4 theme for the Hugo static site generator.

scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --precision 6 source/scss/style.scss static/css/style.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 static/css/style.css.tmp -o static/css/style.css
scripts.build:ltrcss: rtlcss -s static/css/style.css.tmp static/css/style.rtl.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 static/css/style.rtl.css.tmp -o static/css/style.rtl.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:ltrcss && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:cookieconsent && npm run build:generatesri && npm run clean

author: Alan Orth
